page.title: 05St Botolph's Parish Church
page.content: One of the stories that Mrs.Dawson told us was about a man who stole a church plate, and when they found him they skinned him alive and nailed his skin to the door of the church,and years later when the door was being repaired they found some leathery substance and they took it to the Saffron Walden museum and it turned out to be a piece of skin of a blonde haired person going grey. Another story that Mrs.Dawson told us was one about a Parson and his son. Every day they went to say their prayers, then one day the Parson's son died so the Parson bricked up the wall where they used to go through to get into the church to say their prayers and years later when they uncovered the door they found a bees' nest and today we saw where the honeycomb had been, and the next story is a sort of follow on.
